repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: An incomplete copy of the Tolkāppiyam, text and commentary. At the time of binding the title page, the index of cūttirams and the missing beginning were added on blue paper. The end of the text is missing.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (April 2019).

support.p: Blue paper (u1; U1, f1-9; u2) and white paper (U1, f10-f313).

supportDesc.foliation: Library Arabic foliation 1-313 (U1) taken here as reference. Tamil pagination 3-612 (U1, lf10r-lf313v).

collation.desc: 1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
1 folio = Title Page. Library Arabic foliation 1. Verso blank.
7 folios = Tolkāppiyam: Index of cūttirams. Library Arabic foliation 2-8.
305 folios = Tolkāppiyam: Text. Library Arabic foliation 9-313.

handNote.desc: Hand #1. Adding the missing parts on blue paper.

additions.desc: Current BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 172 (front cover, recto).
Old BnF shelfmark in black pencil Tamoul N° 172 (f[1]r).
Index of cūttirams, in the form of a table. The beginnings of the cūttirams are arranged alphabetically in the first column and reference to page and cūttiram's number are given in culumns 2-3.

origin.origDate: Not internal date. Not dated by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) nor by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequested in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 29, no. 172.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 43r, no. 172.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Encoded and revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, July 2022.
